mapper.update: update client set ClientName = #{clientname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClientSex = #{clientsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClientPwd = #{clientpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClientTEL = #{clienttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClientDate = #{clientdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ClientSite = #{clientsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClientNotes = #{clientnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ClientID = #{clientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ClientID, ClientName, ClientSex, UserID, ClientPwd, ClientTEL, ClientDate, ClientSite, ClientNotes from client where ClientID = #{clientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ClientID, ClientName, ClientSex, UserID, ClientPwd, ClientTEL, ClientDate, ClientSite, ClientNotes from client
